name: qseq1d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(cqs(c0, c1), cqs(c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cqs(c0, c1), cqs(c2, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cqs(c0, c1), cqs(c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cqs(c0, c1), cqs(c2, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cqs(c0, c1), cqs(c2, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cqs(c0, c1), cqs(c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cqs(c0, c1), cqs(c2, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))

comment: Equality theorem for quotient set, deduction form. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 27-May-2021.)
